chapters.title: Chapter 7: A Matter of Thought
chapters.info: Shemerin, p. 155 (208)—Aes Sedai of the Yellow Ajah, reduced to Accepted by Elaida against all Tower law. She ran away from the Tower after being reduced. Shemerin was one of the Aes Sedai who personally saw to Siuan Sanche's removal from office.
